7.CN: 音频 - 每次读取的采样数

8.CN: 定义每次读取音频的帧数, 参考https://people.csail.mit.edu/hubert/pyaudio/docs/
8.EN: Specifies the number of samples per buffer, refer to https://people.csail.mit.edu/hubert/pyaudio/docs/

10.CN: 音频通道数 (1 - 单声道, 2 - 立体声)
10.EN: Number of audio channels (1 for mono, 2 for stereo)

12.CN: 音频的每份采样大小: 每份样本x位
12.EN: Sampling size: x bits per sample

14.CN: 音频采样频率, 单位为赫兹

16.CN: 音频阈值：音频值不小于此阈值将被视为有效语音
16.EN: Audio threshold: audio value not less than this threshold will be consider valid voice

17.CN: 音频 - 处理函数Audioop.rms阈值

18.CN:
音频处理函数Audioop.rms: 返回片段的均方根, 即sqrt(sum(S_i^2)/n). 
参考https://docs.python.org/3/library/audioop.html
18.EN:
Audioop.rms: Return the root-mean-square of the fragment, i.e. sqrt(sum(S_i^2)/n).
This is a measure of the power in an audio signal.
Refer to https://docs.python.org/3/library/audioop.html

20.CN: 连续x次采样都是小于设定的阀值, 则可以认为没有音频, 断点
20.EN: break point after consecutive X samples are below the Watch threshold

22.CN: 如果没有信号输入, 每秒检查X次
22.EN: Check X times per second, if no signal input

24.CN: 刷新音频可视化, 为每个缓冲区的音频帧数的X倍
24.EN: Refresh audio visualization in X times of Audio frames per buffer

26.EN:
visualizing signal enhance, 
to make better looking of the sinal diagram, should be greater than 1

28.CN: 翻译 - 百度应用ID, 注册网址: https://api.fanyi.baidu.com/
28.EN: Translatror - Baidu App ID, register with https://api.fanyi.baidu.com/

32.CN: 音频转文本 - 百度ID, 注册网址: https://ai.baidu.com/
32.EN: Audio to Text - Baidu ID, register with https://ai.baidu.com/

33.CN: 音频转文本 - 百度密钥

34.CN: 音频转文本 - 百度应用密钥

35.EN: Audio to Text - Baidu Secret Key

51.EN: this app needs to restart, go?

52.CN: 更改UI语言, 重新启动。。。

58.EN: Load History: you selected a wrong file name, its name should be 'audio_info.json' !!

69.EN: Please select at least one device!!

83.EN: display how many audio points per page on the screen.

84.EN: Code to encrypt or decrypt your data

85.EN: Please input the code to encrypt or decrypt your data

密码与上次不一样！
继续吗?

91.CN: 音频转文本 - 微软Azure语音密钥
91.EN: Audio to Text - MS Azure Speech-Key

92.EN: Audio to Text - MS Azure Speech-Key, register with https://portal.azure.com/#home

96.EN: Translatror - MS Azure Key, register with https://portal.azure.com/#home

111.CN: 秒, 因为语音转文本有时间长度限制, 音频片段不能太长, 一般不超过30秒!
111.EN:
Seconds, not allow one audio section too long, normally <= 30 seconds, 
because of audio length limit for converting audio to text!

113.CN:
可视化线段颜色: 颜色名称, 或者16进制格式 (例如#FFFFFF), 
但将优先使用其设备指定的颜色。
113.EN:
Visualizing line color: color name, or hex format as #FFFFFF, 
but will use its device's assigned color in priority.

115.CN: 保存语音记录的文件夹/Records
115.EN: Records saved in the folder /Records, where you keep the audio records

117.EN:

 in the folder
